meanings.definition: A person who owns or operates a mill.
meanings.sent1: The millers worked hard to ensure the mill ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The millers in the town were respected for their dedication to their work.
meanings.sent3: The millers decided to have a race to see who could operate their mill the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The millers were like conductors, orchestrating the movements of the mill machinery.
meanings.sent5: The millers' expertise in operating the mill was unmatched in the region.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'miller', referring to multiple individuals who own or operate mills.
meanings.sent1: The group of millers gathered to discuss ways to improve their mills.
meanings.sent2: Many millers across the country faced similar challenges in running their mills.
meanings.sent3: The millers held a picnic by the river to celebrate their successful harvest season.
meanings.sent4: The millers stood tall like guardians, protecting their mills from any harm.
meanings.sent5: The millers' dedication to their craft inspired others to pursue careers in milling.
